import React from 'react' import { Switch, Route, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './App.css' import HomePage from './pages/homepage/HomePage' import ShopPage from './pages/shopPage/ShopPage' import SignInAndSignUpPage from './pages/sign-in-sign-up/SignInSignUp' import CheckoutPage from './pages/checkoutPage/CheckoutPage' import Header from './components/header/Header' // selectors import { setCurrentUser } from './redux/user/user.actions' import { selectCurrentUser } from './redux/user/user.selectors' const App = () => { const currentUser = useSelector(selectCurrentUser) return (
currentUser ? : } />
) } export default App
